author: PBOrb
body:
These commands do not allow a gMSA to be set as a service account on a service from what I can see (it's not documented if it is possible).
This reduces their usefulness and pollutes Powershell scripts because older methods still need to be used in the script eg Get-WMIObject.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @PBOrb You could look #8626 and feedback there.

title: New-Service, Set-Service - no ability to set gMSA as Service Account
